title: Energy and charge of capacitor as property change

content.question: When a voltage V is connected across a capacitor of capacitance C, charges of equal magnitude Q and opposite sign are on the plates, and the energy stored in the capacitor is U. If C is doubled and V is not changed, how are Q and U affected?

choices.label:
Q
 U

Not changed
 Not changed

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
